title: Telegraph readers have picked their England XVs to take on New Zealand in the Rugby World Cup 2019 semi-finals - here are the results
text:
England take on New Zealand in the first semi-final of the Rugby World Cup on Saturday and there are a number of selection dilemmas facing Eddie Jones.

Does George Kruis start to improve England's lineout? Has George Ford done enough to force his way back into the starting team? Is Jack Nowell ready to start a World Cup semi-final?

We asked our Telegraph readers to vote on the team they would pick to face New Zealand on Saturday, and you can read the results below.

15. Elliot Daly - 51 per cent

Daly's place was the most hotly contested position after a unconvincing performance at fullback...
description: England take on New Zealand in the first semi-final of the Rugby World Cup on Saturday and there are a number of selection dilemmas facing Eddie Jones.
